Raaskoin.interface_summary: Handles gold-backed token logic and interacts with GoldPriceOracle for pricing.

Raastoken.interface_summary: Utility token used across the Raasystem ecosystem with minting and burning capabilities.

Rabex.interface_summary: AI-driven decentralized exchange handling order books, spreads, and liquidity management.

Raaswallet.interface_summary: Non-custodial wallet interface for users to manage Raaskoin, Raastoken, and other assets.

Raaspay.interface_summary: Payment gateway for merchants enabling crypto-to-fiat settlements using Raaskoin.

GoldPriceOracle.interface_summary: Stores and updates gold price data fetched off-chain for use by Raaskoin.
